inclusion.criterion: Elevated pulmonary vascular resistance (>240 dynes.cm.sec-5) or transpulmonary gradient (>12 mmHg)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Evidence of left ventricular diastolic dysfunction: LA>4.0, LVH or diastolic dysfunction by mitral filling pattern
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Echocardiogram: Normal or mildly reduced LV ejection fraction (greater than or equal to 40%)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Symptomatic chronic HF (WHO functional class II-IV)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Maximal treatment of diastolic dysfunction as noted by the treating physicians with no change in medical therapy for one month prior to entry
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Use of endothelin receptor antagonist, prostacyclin or PDE-5 inhibitor within 4 weeks of enrollment
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Exercise capacity limited by other illness (other lung disease, arthritis, mobility limitations)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has multifactorial chronic hypoxemia and dyspnea thought due to diastolic CHF, pulmonary hypertension thought secondary to a chronic ASD and COPD on 5L home oxygen. Cardiology consult recommended a right heart cath for evaluation of response to sildenafil but the patient refused.
